name: VKFixes
description:
VK Fix
Hide Ads
Hide Recomendation
Hide Mini Chat
Static Block
And Others
New Left Menu
css: @-moz-document domain(vk.com) {body{letter-spacing:0.3px!important}span,button,a,div,input{letter-spacing:0.3px!important}.page_name{font-weight:bold!important}.header_right_link:first-letter,#profile_short .profile_info_row:nth-child(3) .labeled:first-letter,#profile_time_lv:first-letter{text-transform:uppercase}.top_profile_img,.top_audio_play{display:none}.top_profile_arrow{margin-right:8px;margin-left:0}.input.text.ts_input,.input_back{padding:8px 6px 6px 19px!important}.narrow_column_wrap,.narrow_column{position:static!important;margin-top:0!important}#side_bar_inner{background:#fff;border-radius:2px;box-shadow:0 1px 0 0 #d7d8db,0 0 0 1px #e3e4e8;margin-top:57px!important}#side_bar .left_fixer{padding:0 15px 0 20px!important}#side_bar .left_icon{width:0;height:0}#side_bar ol li{margin-left:0!important}#side_bar .more_div{margin-left:0!important;margin-right:0!important;border-top:1px solid #f1f1f1!important}#side_bar ol{margin:0!important}#side_bar .left_label{font-size:13px!important}#side_bar ol li .left_row:hover{background:#F5F7FA!important}#side_bar{margin-right:16px;font-size:12px!important;position:relative;top:0!important}.left_menu_nav_wrap{position:absolute;border-top:none!important;margin:0 8px}.left_menu_nav_wrap a:nth-child(2){padding-right:0}#stl_side{display:none!important}#stl_left{width:0!important}.blog_right_menu_nav{margin-top:10px}.blog_right_menu .left_menu_nav_wrap{margin:0 18px}.blog_right_menu .left_menu_nav_wrap a:nth-child(2){padding-right:10px}.quick_login{padding:0 9px}#quick_pass,#quick_email{width:100%}.chat_onl_wrap{display:none!important}.ads_ad_box,#left_ads,#ads_left,.ads_ads_box,.ads_ads_box2,.ads_ads_box3,#bFooter p{display:none}.friends_possible_block,#groups_filters_wrap{display:none}/*[[fixCheckbox]]*/}
